Event Archive


International Congress on Obesity



























Training and events form a large part of the World Obesity Federation’s work.








Not only do we run online and in-person training under the SCOPE initiative, we also host and attend events across the globe, ensuring we keep current with regional trends and have the opportunity to meet many of our Members and collaborators in person.  At any point in time there will be an event we are either hosting, promoting or attending – so keep an eye out for when we are in your part of the world!











Training








Events












Upcoming Events
View all












SCOPE School Sep 03, 24


SCOPE School Melbourne 

Join us on 3 September at IFSO 2024 and delve into 'Obesity management & treatment: A multidisciplinary approach'.
View Event














Member Sep 03, 24


XXVII IFSO World Congress: IFSO 2024

IFSO will be holding its 27th World Congress in Melbourne, Australia from 3 - 6 September 2024.
View Event














Member Sep 24, 24


UK Congress on Obesity (UKCO) 2024

UKCO 2024 takes place in Oxford on 24 and 25 September, hosted by the UK Association for the Study of Obesity.
View Event
